body: Hi Chris, I completely rebuilt the script by hand without copying any components, using the latest github synch'd files. - and I still get the error on two different machines. Even when I just use one single box brep from the test file. You said it might have something to do with duplicate surface names, could you point me to how I can diagnose and bug fix this, as I'm unsure about what's going on in the backend of things? Best, Max [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DLAtIY7YVfKsKTn1Z*blav2zFCZ1nnZP9w8gTIVRWH5wAsPA-Xkq-kgYNaltDtnIhgcX4Rg6Yp5m3JMSu0EI*bnRM9if1K9y/kaputt.jpg)
